metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12403 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way CHACHA20-POLY1305 was implemented in NSS in versions before 3.55. When using multi-part Chacha20, it could cause out-of-bounds reads. This issue was fixed by explicitly disabling multi-part ChaCha20 (which was not functioning correctly) and strictly enforcing tag length. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality and system availability.

criterions.comment: nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
